sentences.en: After the removal of the soup, fish was served.
sentences.cn: 汤撤去后, 鱼就上来了.

sentences.en: Clearance of the site required the removal of a number of trees.
sentences.cn: 清理这一场所需要移走不少树。

sentences.en: Clearance of the site required the removal of a number of trees.
sentences.cn: 清理这一场所需要移走不少树。

sentences.en: It provides BOD removal levels of 25 to 30 percent.
sentences.cn: 这一过程就可以脱去生化需氧量25%至30%.

sentences.en: It was a removal from the vicinity of Norland beyond her wishes.
sentences.cn: 从诺兰德地区迁走不是她的愿望.

sentences.en: One of the oldest method of salt removal is dialysis.
sentences.cn: 透析是最古老的去盐方法之一.

sentences.en: Parliament had decided that his removal from power was illegal.
sentences.cn: 国会决议认为他的免职是非法的。

sentences.en: Removal of the inducer results in immidiate cessation of enzyme synthesis.
sentences.cn: 除去诱导物就会立即终止酶的合成.

sentences.en: The factory announced its removal to another town.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂宣布迁往另一座城市.

sentences.en: The introduction of the field results in a removal of the degeneracy.
sentences.cn: 引入磁场,导致了简并消除.

sentences.en: The removal men have been in and out all day.
sentences.cn: 搬家工人一整天都在进进出出。

sentences.en: The removal of petty restrictions has made life easier.
sentences.cn: 对一些琐碎规定的取消使生活更自在了.

sentences.en: The students agitated for the removal of a certain teacher.
sentences.cn: 学生们鼓动要更换某教员.

sentences.en: They rejected a demand for the removal of all nuclear weapons from UK soil.
sentences.cn: 他们拒绝了将所有核武器从英国国土上撤除的要求。

sentences.en: They were in the furniture removal business.
What they expected to be the removal of a small lump turned out to be major surgery.
sentences.cn: 他们原以为只需切除小肿块的手术最后变成了一次大手术。

words.tran_cn: 可移动的；可去掉的；可免职的
去除剂；搬运工；搬家公司

phrases.tran_cn: 热排出；热量排除；排热；取热

trans.tran_en: the process of taking furniture from your old house to your new one
